subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni, averaging 58 wins in four full seasons with the Suns, is bringing his frantic style to a Knicks team that has lacked personality in recent years.
snippet: Mike D’Antoni, averaging 58 wins in four full seasons with the Suns, is bringing his frantic style to a Knicks team that has lacked personality in recent years.
